thread.title: 3 days in New York -
thread.title_full: 3 days in New York - Review of SoHo Garden Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Verity T
title: 3 days in New York -
text: Stayed at the Soho Garden hotel for 3 nights, was a great location, subway was right outside the door of the hotel to get you to Times square and all the other attractions. Room was basic but had everything you need, spacious and clean. Reception staff were great and really helpful. Lots of nice coffee shops and restaurants nearby along with shopping and groceries. I would definitely stay here again!
